resources.string: QuickBall floating ball service that provides a floating ball overlay on your screen for quick access to features.
Allows QuickBall to display floating overlay,\ncontrol volume, and lock your device
Allows QuickBall to adjust screen brightness
Required for screen lock on older Android versions

QuickBall requires an accessibility service for its core functionality, to display a floating ball overlay and perform system actions like volume control, brightness adjustment, and screen lock.

The accessibility service is essential for the app to work properly and provide quick access to device controls from anywhere on your screen.

It never collects or shares any data! It is focused on privacy and the app does not send any network requests.

QuickBall requires system settings permission to modify screen brightness levels in order to provide brightness control features.

This permission is needed for the brightness up and down controls in the floating ball menu to work properly.

It never collects or shares any data! It is focused on privacy and the app does not send any network requests.
